## ThemeParams interface

An interface describing props that receive the remirror theme.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ThemeParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [theme](./core-types.themeparams.theme.md) | <code>RemirrorTheme</code> | The remirror theme passed down through the react context. |
